quote: Captain's log, Stardate 41209.2.   We are running at Warp 7 to   rendezvous with the science vessel   S. S. Tsiolkovsky...
scene: 1    EXT. SPACE - ENTERPRISE (OPTICAL)

quote: ... which has been routinely   monitoring the collapse of a red   supergiant star into a white   dwarf. What has brought us here   is a series of strange messages   indicating something has gone   wrong aboard the research vessel.
scene: 1    EXT. SPACE - ENTERPRISE (OPTICAL)

quote: Well, hello Enterprise.   Welcome... I hope you have a lot   of pretty boys on board... because   I'm willing... and waiting...
scene: 3    INT. MAIN BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: S.S. Tsiolkovsky, repeat your   message.
scene: 3    INT. MAIN BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: In fact... we're going to have a   real blowout here... Thought that   would interest you. Waiting!
scene: 3    INT. MAIN BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Captain... what we just heard is,   well...impossible.
scene: 3    INT. MAIN BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Report.
scene: 3    INT. MAIN BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: I believe that last sound we heard   was an emergency hatch being   blown.
scene: 3    INT. MAIN BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Are you certain... yes, of course   you are.
scene: 3    INT. MAIN BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Sensor scan now reveals no life   signs aboard, Captain.
scene: 3    INT. MAIN BRIDGE (OPTICAL)

quote: Put us on their bridge, Chief.
scene: 4    INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON AWAY TEAM (OPTICAL)
location: TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON AWAY TEAM

quote: Life support systems are not   functioning in that area, sir.
scene: 4    INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON AWAY TEAM (OPTICAL)
location: TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON AWAY TEAM

quote: Then put us in the main corridor.   Energize.
scene: 4    INT. TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON AWAY TEAM (OPTICAL)
location: TRANSPORTER ROOM - ANGLE ON AWAY TEAM

quote: Cover the ship as planned. Move   out.
scene: 5    INT. TSIOLKOVSKY MAIN CORRIDOR - ON AWAY TEAM (OPTICAL)
location: TSIOLKOVSKY MAIN CORRIDOR - ON AWAY TEAM

quote: Indications of what humans would   call... a "wild party?"
scene: 6    INT. SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA (OPTICAL)
location: SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Their bridge. If this thing   works, be sure to record ---
scene: 6    INT. SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA (OPTICAL)
location: SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: You were right. Somebody blew   the hatch and they were all sucked   out into space..
scene: 6    INT. SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA (OPTICAL)
location: SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Correction, sir, blown out.
scene: 6    INT. SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA (OPTICAL)
location: SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Thank you, Data.
scene: 6    INT. SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA (OPTICAL)
location: SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: A common mistake, sir...
scene: 6    INT. SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA (OPTICAL)
location: SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: I know! Thank you, Data.
scene: 6    INT. SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA (OPTICAL)
location: SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Commander Riker, it's Lieutenant   Yar, location Engineering. Ten   people here, sir, all frozen.   No vital signs.
scene: 6    INT. SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA (OPTICAL)
location: SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Frozen how?
scene: 6    INT. SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA (OPTICAL)
location: SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Looks to me like someone was   "playing" with the environmental   controls, sir. Just let all the   heat bleed away into space.
scene: 6    INT. SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA (OPTICAL)
location: SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: That's ridiculous!
scene: 6    INT. SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA (OPTICAL)
location: SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: That's what I say, sir.
scene: 6    INT. SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA (OPTICAL)
location: SECOND CORRIDOR - ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Sir, Lieutenant La Forge in the   crew quarters. Something in here.
scene: 9    INT. PERSONNEL QUARTERS - ANGLE ON ENTRY DOOR

quote: Hello!
scene: 9    INT. PERSONNEL QUARTERS - ANGLE ON ENTRY DOOR

quote: Riker to Captain, I have a report   for you.
scene: 15   INT. TSIOLKOVSKY MAIN CORRIDOR - EMPHASIZING RIKER

quote: Picard here.
scene: 16   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - CLOSE ON PICARD

quote: They're all dead, sir. Some were   apparently blown out the emergency   hatches.
scene: 16   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - CLOSE ON PICARD

quote: There were eighty people on that   ship, Number One.
scene: 16   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - CLOSE ON PICARD

quote: Yes sir. As I said, all dead.
scene: 16   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - CLOSE ON PICARD

quote: Captain's log, supplemental. We   are downloading the research   information gathered on the   collapsing...
scene: 17   EXT. SPACE - ENTERPRISE AND TSIOLKOVSKY (OPTICAL)

quote: ... star nearby. I am concerned   at being in such close orbit, but   the Tsiolkovsky's research   records...
scene: 17   EXT. SPACE - ENTERPRISE AND TSIOLKOVSKY (OPTICAL)

quote: ... will no doubt predict the time   of the star's final collapse.
scene: 19   INT. ENTERPRISE MEDICAL CORRIDOR

quote: I can't find anything unusual in   any of the tricorder readings   they've sent over, Captain.
scene: 20   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - ON BEVERLY, PICARD AND TROI

quote: Give me a theory, Doctor.   Anything!
scene: 20   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - ON BEVERLY, PICARD AND TROI

quote: Troi? Did you feel anything from   over there?
scene: 20   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - ON BEVERLY, PICARD AND TROI

quote: Perhaps some residual   confusion... and exhilaration, too.   But I'm not too certain of that.
scene: 20   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - ON BEVERLY, PICARD AND TROI

quote: Madness? Mass hysteria?   Delusion?
scene: 20   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - ON BEVERLY, PICARD AND TROI

quote: Any or all, Captain.
scene: 20   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - ON BEVERLY, PICARD AND TROI

quote: All right. Let's bring the away   team back. Set the transporter   for maximum decontamination. And   then full examinations and   observation when they're here.
scene: 20   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - ON BEVERLY, PICARD AND TROI

quote: If you were any more perfect,   Data, I'd write you up in a   Starfleet medical textbook.
scene: 22   INT. ENTERPRISE SICKBAY - BEVERLY, RIKER, GEORDI,

quote: I am already listed in several   biomechanical texts, Doctor.
scene: 22   INT. ENTERPRISE SICKBAY - BEVERLY, RIKER, GEORDI,

quote: Yes... of course.       You're next, Lieutenant.
scene: 22   INT. ENTERPRISE SICKBAY - BEVERLY, RIKER, GEORDI,

quote: Normal -- all across.   Except... why are you perspiring?
scene: 22   INT. ENTERPRISE SICKBAY - BEVERLY, RIKER, GEORDI,

quote: I suppose because you have it too   hot in here. What else would it   be?
scene: 22   INT. ENTERPRISE SICKBAY - BEVERLY, RIKER, GEORDI,

quote: That doesn't... sound exactly like   you, Geordi.
scene: 22   INT. ENTERPRISE SICKBAY - BEVERLY, RIKER, GEORDI,

quote: Maybe it wasn't.       Maybe she threw her voice.
scene: 22   INT. ENTERPRISE SICKBAY - BEVERLY, RIKER, GEORDI,

quote: Joke.
scene: 22   INT. ENTERPRISE SICKBAY - BEVERLY, RIKER, GEORDI,

quote: Of course. But I would like to   run another test or two on you,   Lieutenant.
scene: 22   INT. ENTERPRISE SICKBAY - BEVERLY, RIKER, GEORDI,

quote: Sickbay to Bridge...
scene: 25   INT. MAIN BRIDGE AND CRUSHER'S OFFICE (INTERCUTS)

quote: Picard here. Go ahead, Doctor.
scene: 25   INT. MAIN BRIDGE AND CRUSHER'S OFFICE (INTERCUTS)

quote: I'm confining Lieutenant La Forge   to Sickbay until further notice.
scene: 25   INT. MAIN BRIDGE AND CRUSHER'S OFFICE (INTERCUTS)

quote: Do we have a problem, Doctor?
scene: 25   INT. MAIN BRIDGE AND CRUSHER'S OFFICE (INTERCUTS)

quote: I don't know yet.
scene: 25   INT. MAIN BRIDGE AND CRUSHER'S OFFICE (INTERCUTS)

quote: Data, I need help in locating some   library-computer information.
scene: 26   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Specifics, sir?
scene: 26   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: All I have is a vague memory of   reading somewhere about someone   taking a shower in his or her   clothing.
scene: 26   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Ah. The body Geordi discovered.
scene: 26   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: And I believe it may have happened   before.
scene: 26   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: To "someone," "somewhere."
scene: 26   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Should be easy for someone written   up in biomechanical texts.
scene: 26   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: About that... did the doctor   believe I was boasting?
scene: 26   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Probably.       This may take some time?
scene: 26   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: At least several hours.       But what I said was a statement   of fact.
scene: 26   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Perhaps she will look it up.
scene: 26   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: You can depend on it.
scene: 26   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Geordi!
scene: 30   INT. SICKBAY - ON GEORDI

quote: Security! Lieutenant La Forge   just left Sickbay while my back   was turned. It's important we   find him.
scene: 33   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON TASHA

quote: Security team alert, pick up   Lieutenant La Forge who left   Sickbay moments ago.       Captain, anything further?
scene: 33   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON TASHA

quote: Affirmative. Make it a ship-wide   search, Lieutenant.
scene: 33   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON TASHA

quote: It's a model of the same kind of   tractor beam our ship uses... with   some ideas of my own added.
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: So that's your science project.   Wes, you are something!
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: Meanwhile, the captain won't let   me visit the bridge.
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: So I use this to imagine I'm   there.
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: Take the helm, Mister Crusher.   Set a course for thirty-seven mark   one hundred eighty. Warp six.
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: That's the captain's voice.
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: Pieced together from words he's   used on the intercom.       I can pretend he's ordering me   to take the Enterprise anywhere.   And listen to this...
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: Chief Engineer, report to the   Bridge. Commander Riker, report   to the Bridge. Doctor Crusher,   report to the Bridge.
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: What d'you think?
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: I think the captain's lucky you're   on his side.
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: But he still won't let me on the   bridge. And there's nothing there   I don't understand.
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: Wish I understood myself that   well.
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: You okay?
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: No. Suddenly I seem to be burning   up inside.
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: Wow it's hot in here.
scene: 34   INT. CRUSHER'S QUARTERS - ANGLE ON WESLEY AND

quote: Geordi... ?
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: Medical's been worried about you.
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: Help me.
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: Lieutenant Yar in the Observation   Lounge. Send a team here now.
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: Tasha... I said "help me." Help   me not to give in to the wild   things coming into my mind...
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: Geordi -- my job is security...
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: Please.
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: Yes, helping is more important.   How can I help you Geordi?
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: Help me to see like you do.
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: But you already see better than   I can.
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: I see more. But more isn't   better!
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: Geordi...
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: I want to see in shallow, dim,   beautiful human ways.
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: We'll talk about it, Geordi.       I'm going to take you to Sickbay   now. All right?
scene: 35   INT. OBSERVATION LOUNGE - ANGLE ON GEORDI

quote: Captain's log, supplemental. I   am concerned that away team member   Lieutenant La Forge has been taken   to Sickbay. The report: "unusual   behavior."
scene: 38   EXT. SPACE - ENTERPRISE AND TSIOLKOVSKY (OPTICAL)

quote: ... and then we got him down to   sickbay so Dr. Crusher could   examine him.
scene: 40   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - ON TASHA AND PICARD

quote: He wasn't violent?
scene: 40   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - ON TASHA AND PICARD

quote: No, sir. He was very upset... he   kept talking about wanting normal   eyes.
scene: 40   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - ON TASHA AND PICARD

quote: Thank you, Lieutenant. I'll be   in Sickbay.
scene: 40   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - ON TASHA AND PICARD

quote: According to our medical readouts,   there's still nothing wrong with   him. He looks like he's running   a temperature but every instrument   we have says he's not.
scene: 42   INT. SICKBAY - ON BEVERLY, GEORDI, TROI, PICARD

quote: Doctor, every person on that ship   over there died. Is there any   chance that whatever did it is   loose on my ship?
scene: 42   INT. SICKBAY - ON BEVERLY, GEORDI, TROI, PICARD

quote: If you mean a disease, sir, I'd   say there's no chance of it. We   used full decontamination, we   examined each team member   carefully...
scene: 42   INT. SICKBAY - ON BEVERLY, GEORDI, TROI, PICARD

quote: The entire crew over there somehow   managed to kill themselves,   Doctor. If it wasn't a disease,   what else could have made them   do that?
scene: 42   INT. SICKBAY - ON BEVERLY, GEORDI, TROI, PICARD

quote: The obvious alternatives would   be in areas of insanity, severe   emotional upset...       Troi, do you feel anything unusual   in the lieutenant here?
scene: 42   INT. SICKBAY - ON BEVERLY, GEORDI, TROI, PICARD

quote: Security reported he was longing   for normal eyesight. A rather   sudden yearning for that.
scene: 42   INT. SICKBAY - ON BEVERLY, GEORDI, TROI, PICARD

quote: Since his records show no previous   mention of that, the fact that it's   happened now could be important.
scene: 42   INT. SICKBAY - ON BEVERLY, GEORDI, TROI, PICARD

quote: But all I feel from him is   confusion. If I didn't know   better, I'd say he was   intoxicated.
scene: 42   INT. SICKBAY - ON BEVERLY, GEORDI, TROI, PICARD

quote: Our tests would have shown that.   Also any signs of drugs,   hallucinogens or other   contaminants.
scene: 42   INT. SICKBAY - ON BEVERLY, GEORDI, TROI, PICARD

quote: Can you provide more information,   sir? Seeking an instance of   someone showering with their   clothing on is...is...
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: I know... like looking for a needle   in a haystack.
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Why should anyone wish to expend   their time in such a search?
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Correction, Data, I should have   said proverbial needle in a   haystack.
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Ah, a human proverb! As in   folklore, or an historical   allusion, or tribal memories,   or...
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: That's it! Historical! I   remember now that I was reading   a history of all the past   starships named Enterprise.
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Enterprise history. Aberrant   behavior. Medical cross   reference...
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Captain, I believe we've got the   answer to what happened over   there.
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: The Constitution class Enterprise,   Captain James T. Kirk   commanding...
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Similar conditions. They were   monitoring a planet that was   breaking up, not a collapsing star   as in this case, but there were   the same huge shifts in gravity...
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: ... which somehow resulted in   complex strings of water   molecules which then acquired   carbon from the body and acted   on the brain like alcohol!       Mister Data, download that   information immediately to   medical.
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Aye sir, downloading.
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Fascinating! Their entire crew   going out of control...
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Like intoxication but worse.   Judgment almost completely   impaired...
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Until they found this formula,   barely in time.    (moves to his own     console)   Picard to Doctor Crusher, come   in.
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: This is Crusher; go ahead Captain.
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: You can relax, Doctor. The answer   to all this is feeding into your   medical banks now... including a   cure.
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Are you certain, Captain?
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Absolutely!
scene: 43   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON RIKER AND DATA

quote: Tasha?
scene: 46   INT. TROI'S QUARTERS - ON TROI

quote: What're you doing?
scene: 46   INT. TROI'S QUARTERS - ON TROI

quote: I need your advice. That's why   I came to your quarters.
scene: 46   INT. TROI'S QUARTERS - ON TROI

quote: Of course. Anything I can do ---
scene: 46   INT. TROI'S QUARTERS - ON TROI

quote: On clothes. You always wear such   beautiful clothes off duty. And   your hair's so nice all the time.   I want to change my image.       What about this color?
scene: 46   INT. TROI'S QUARTERS - ON TROI

quote: Not for you. Tasha, I feel you're   very uncertain... that you're   fighting something.
scene: 46   INT. TROI'S QUARTERS - ON TROI

quote: What is it?
scene: 46   INT. TROI'S QUARTERS - ON TROI

quote: Never mind. I'll find what I need   myself. Ship's Stores will have   it.

quote: Tasha, wait ---
scene: 46   INT. TROI'S QUARTERS - ON TROI

quote: Troi to Captain Picard.
scene: 46   INT. TROI'S QUARTERS - ON TROI

quote: Picard here.
scene: 48   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: Sir, I think Tasha's been   infected, too. She's just left   my quarters...
scene: 48   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: It's not actually an "infection,"   Counselor.
scene: 48   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: Yes sir, it's more like   intoxication, but whatever it is,   she's got it.
scene: 48   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: Thank you, Counselor.       Number One, our security chief   has the equivalent of a snootful.
scene: 48   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: Inquiry, sir... 'snootful?'
scene: 48   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: Forget it!
scene: 48   INT. MAIN BRIDGE - ON PICARD

quote: Mom, Look what I can do...
scene: 50   INT. CRUSHER'S OFFICE - ANGLE ON BEVERLY

quote: I've been able to widen and   strengthen the beam, just like   I told you last night ---
scene: 51   INT. SICKBAY - INCLUDING WESLEY AND BEVERLY (OPTICAL)

quote: Do me a favor, Wes? There's   something happening on this   ship...       Just to be safe, I'd like you to   stay in our quarters until it's   solved.
scene: 51   INT. SICKBAY - INCLUDING WESLEY AND BEVERLY (OPTICAL)

quote: Right, Mom, right. Your wish   is my...
scene: 51   INT. SICKBAY - INCLUDING WESLEY AND BEVERLY (OPTICAL)

quote: Now, Wes.
scene: 51   INT. SICKBAY - INCLUDING WESLEY AND BEVERLY (OPTICAL)

quote: You could be stunting my emotional   growth, you know.       Why's it so hot in here, anyway?
scene: 51   INT. SICKBAY - INCLUDING WESLEY AND BEVERLY (OPTICAL)

quote: Picard to Crusher. Have you made   a test injection yet? We're   getting indications that this   condition is spreading.
scene: 51   INT. SICKBAY - INCLUDING WESLEY AND BEVERLY (OPTICAL)

quote: No test yet, Captain, but very   soon.
scene: 51   INT. SICKBAY - INCLUDING WESLEY AND BEVERLY (OPTICAL)

quote: Come to Papa; come to Papa... !
scene: 52   INT. CORRIDOR - CLOSE ON A VERY SHAPELY REAR END

quote: Captain, in another forty-one minutes   will see the information from the   Tsiolkovsky downloaded to us.

quote: Why so slow?
scene: 55   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

scene: 55   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: How much danger from that star?   Worse case.

quote: Like a full collapse, sir?
scene: 55   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Any stellar material it threw this   way we could still outrun on half   impulse power.
scene: 55   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - FULL SHOT

quote: Picard to Engineering. Chief   engineer report to the bridge.

scene: 59   INT. ENGINEERING OFFICE - FULL SHOT

quote: Hi, Jim. Was that the captain   sending you to Medical?
scene: 59   INT. ENGINEERING OFFICE - FULL SHOT

quote: Which would leave no one on duty   here. The chief was just   summoned to the bridge.
scene: 59   INT. ENGINEERING OFFICE - FULL SHOT

quote: What about me? I could call your   chief on the bridge if anything   happens.
scene: 59   INT. ENGINEERING OFFICE - FULL SHOT

quote: Reporting as ordered, sir.
scene: 60   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD AND

quote: What?
scene: 60   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD AND

quote: You ordered me to report to the   bridge, sir.
scene: 60   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD AND

quote: I did no such thing. I want you   down in the Engine Room in case   we need to move out of here.
scene: 60   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD AND

quote: Attention all decks, all   divisions. Effective   immediately, I have handed over   control of this vessel to   Acting Captain Wesley Crusher.
scene: 60   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD AND

quote: Acting Capt...
scene: 60   INT. ENTERPRISE MAIN BRIDGE - ANGLE ON PICARD AND

scene: 70   INT. TASHA'S QUARTERS - AT DOOR

scene: 70   INT. TASHA'S QUARTERS - AT DOOR

scene: 70   INT. TASHA'S QUARTERS - AT DOOR

quote: What have you learned, Number   One?
